EmailTemplate.description: Notification after Product Marketing VP Approves/ Rejects a BX009. (The motive of this email is to prevent other Queue members from logging in system to approve/ reject the request which has already been approved/ rejected)
EmailTemplate.name: GMPL/ BX009: Courtesy email to Prod. Mktng VP Queue after action has been taken
EmailTemplate.subject: Action has been taken on BX009 named '{!GMPL_BX009__c.Project__c}' by a Product Marketing VP
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi, This is a courtesy email to inform you that a Product Marketing VP has Approved/ Rejected the BX009 named '{!GMPL_BX009__c.Project__c}' and as of now no action is required from your side. If required, you may access the BX009 via {!GMPL_BX009__c.Link}.
Thanks
